sn41.4:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā therā bhikkhū macchikāsaṇḍe viharanti ambāṭakavane.
sn41.4:4.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn41.4:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn41.4:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn41.4:4.5: “adhivāsentu me, bhante therā, svātanāya gokule bhattan”ti.
sn41.4:4.7: Atha kho citto gahapati therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā there bhikkhū abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn41.4:4.8: Atha kho therā bhikkhū tassā rattiyā accayena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena cittassa gahapatino gokulaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn41.4:5.1: Atha kho citto gahapati there bhikkhū paṇītena sappipāyāsena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
sn41.4:5.2: Atha kho therā bhikkhū bhuttāvino onītapattapāṇino uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
sn41.4:5.3: Cittopi kho gahapati “sesakaṃ vissajjethā”ti vatvā there bhikkhū piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
sn41.4:5.4: Tena kho pana samayena uṇhaṃ hoti kuthitaṃ;
sn41.4:5.5: te ca therā bhikkhū paveliyamānena maññe kāyena gacchanti, yathā taṃ bhojanaṃ bhuttāvino.
sn41.4:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahako tasmiṃ bhikkhusaṃghe sabbanavako hoti.
sn41.4:6.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahako āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.4:6.3: “sādhu khvassa, bhante thera, sītako ca vāto vāyeyya, abbhasampilāpo ca assa, devo ca ekamekaṃ phusāyeyyā”ti.
sn41.4:7.1: “Sādhu khvassa, āvuso mahaka, yaṃ sītako ca vāto vāyeyya, abbhasampilāpo ca assa, devo ca ekamekaṃ phusāyeyyā”ti.
sn41.4:7.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahako tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhari yathā sītako ca vāto vāyi, abbhasampilāpo ca assa, devo ca ekamekaṃ phusi.
sn41.4:7.4: “yo kho imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṃghe sabbanavako bhikkhu tassāyaṃ evarūpo iddhānubhāvo”ti.
sn41.4:7.5: Atha kho āyasmā mahako ārāmaṃ sampāpuṇitvā āyasmantaṃ theraṃ etadavoca:
sn41.4:7.10: Atha kho therā bhikkhū yathāvihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
sn41.4:8.1: Atha kho citto gahapati yenāyasmā mahako tenupasaṅkami;
sn41.4:8.2: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahakaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn41.4:8.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṃ mahakaṃ etadavoca:
sn41.4:8.4: “sādhu me, bhante, ayyo mahako uttari manussadhammaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetū”ti.
sn41.4:8.5: “Tena hi tvaṃ, gahapati, ālinde uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññapetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ okāsehī”ti.
sn41.4:8.6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho citto gahapati āyasmato mahakassa paṭissutvā ālinde uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññapetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ okāsesi.
sn41.4:8.7: Atha kho āyasmā mahako vihāraṃ pavisitvā sūcighaṭikaṃ datvā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhari yathā tālacchiggaḷena ca aggaḷantarikāya ca acci nikkhamitvā tiṇāni jhāpesi, uttarāsaṅgaṃ na jhāpesi.
sn41.4:8.8: Atha kho citto gahapati uttarāsaṅgaṃ papphoṭetvā saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
sn41.4:8.9: Atha kho āyasmā mahako vihārā nikkhamitvā cittaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
sn41.4:9.8: Atha kho āyasmā mahako senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya macchikāsaṇḍamhā pakkāmi.
sn41.4:9.9: Yaṃ macchikāsaṇḍamhā pakkāmi, tathā pakkantova ahosi;
